metadata.title: What's Hiding In My Coffee Maker?
metadata.excerpt: Using the PicoTag project to dump SPI flash firmware from a coffee maker and explore what's hidden inside.

metadata.title: Introducing PicoTag: Your Pocket-Sized Hardware Hacking Assistant
metadata.excerpt: Meet PicoTag, a modular CircuitPython firmware for the RP2040, designed for hardware interaction, testing, and exploration.

metadata.title: LoRa without LoRaWAN
metadata.excerpt: Exploring the use of LoRa technology for direct P2P communication, bypassing the LoRaWAN network.
metadata.author: Riley Porter
